name: Coloured Fighters
description:
You play as a fighter with the ability to change colour to hurt different coloured enemies. The player must survive 10 waves which include enemy fighters, gunships and carriers.

This was developed for the  MyFirstGameJam:Summer 2020 Game Jam which has the theme of change.

Controls-

Move Mouse- turn player fighter

Left Click- shoot

Right Click- boost

Space- change colour

P- pause game

Note: there is a lighting issue and some lag in the HTML version shown on page so use the windows for best experience. HTML best played full screen as if you click off-screen the keyboard inputs will be disabled until you go full screen.
